title: US military hits five boats eight people killed search continues
snippets: The US says a search is underway for survivors after it bombed what it said was a suspected drug trafficking convoy.
Latest attacks bring total number of boat strikes to 33 and the number of people killed to at least 112 since September.

The U.S. military says it struck five alleged drug-smuggling boats over two days. The attacks killed eight people, while others jumped overboard and may have survived. U.S. Southern Command did not reveal where the attacks occurred.

The U.S. military said Wednesday it struck five alleged drug-smuggling boats over two days, killing a total of eight people while others jumped overboard and may have survived.

summary: The U.S. military struck five alleged drug-smuggling boats over two days, killing eight people. Some individuals jumped overboard and may have survived. A search for survivors is ongoing. These attacks bring the total number of boat strikes to 33 and at least 112 people killed since September. The U.S. Southern Command did not disclose the location of the incidents.

title: Miami beats Ohio State to reach football playoff semifinals
snippets: Keionte Scott returned an interception 72 yards for a touchdown, Carson Beck threw a scoring pass and No. 10 Miami shocked defending champion Ohio State 24-14 on Wednesday night at the Cotton Bowl in the first College Football Playoff quarterfinal.

ARLINGTON, Texas — Keionte Scott returned an interception 72 yards for a touchdown, Carson Beck had a TD pass and No. 10 Miami shocked defending champion Ohio State 24-14 on Wednesday night at the Cotton Bowl in the first College Football Playoff quarterfinal. The Hurricanes (12-2, CFP No. 10 seed) have won two playoff games to get into football’s final four after needing an at-large berth to make the 12-team field, after not even without playing in the Atlantic Coast Conference championship game. One more win and they will get to play for a national championship in their home stadium. Next...
titles: Miami knocks off Ohio St., marches on in CFP

constructiveness_reason: semantic: pos_sim=0.00, neg_sim=0.00; length_penalty=0.35 (<12 tokens)
summary: No. 10 Miami defeated defending champion Ohio State 24-14 in the Cotton Bowl, the first College Football Playoff quarterfinal. Keionte Scott scored on a 72-yard interception return, and Carson Beck threw a touchdown pass. Miami, now 12-2, has advanced to the playoff semifinals and is one win away from reaching the national championship game.

summary: France has drafted a law to ban children under 15 from major social media platforms, following Australia’s lead. Lawmakers are expected to debate the proposal next month. The French president reiterated his support for the measure in his New Year’s Eve address. If approved, the law could take effect from September 2025.

title: Thieves steal millions from bank safe boxes in Germany
snippets: Thieves drill into a German bank vault and steal tens of millions of euros’ worth of property AP News
Around 3,000 safe-deposit boxes were breached as thieves drilled through a basement wall and got away undetected, according to police in Gelsenkirchen, Germany.
The robbers stole valuables with an insured value of at least $36 million from a bank in Gelsenkirchen, western Germany.
Thieves broke into a German bank vault, making off with tens of millions of dollars of valuables from over 3,000 safe deposit boxes.
